sourcesContent: import React from "react"; import { ButtonBack, ButtonFirst, ButtonLast, ButtonNext, CarouselProvider, DotGroup, ImageWithZoom, Slide, Slider, } from "pure-react-carousel"; import "pure-react-carousel/dist/react-carousel.es.css"; import styles from "../styles/Carousel.module.css"; export const ImgSlider = ({ images }) => { return ( <> First Back Next Last {/* */} {/* {images.map((img) => ( ))} */} ); };
